categories: Category:Battles of the Great Galactic War

nodes.text: During the Great Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic, a Republic fleet including the starship Sarapin Wanderer was attacked by Imperial ships. After the death of the Wanderer's captain, the Jedi Master Oteg took command and organized a counterattack that drove the enemy into a nearby nebula to destroy them.
